emerald.description: The Emerald ParaTime is our official EVM Compatible ParaTime providing smart contract environment with full EVM compatibility.
emerald.gatewayDescription: To get started building on our Emerald ParaTime, you can use our public Web3 gateway, fully compatible with Ethereum's Web3 gateway.

sapphire.description: The Sapphire ParaTime is our official confidential EVM Compatible ParaTime providing a smart contract development environment with EVM compatibility.

search.placeholder: Address, Block, Contract, Transaction hash, Token name, etc.

error.tooShort: Please enter either at least 3 characters or a number in order to perform a search.
error.privacy:
It seems like you might accidentally entered a keyphrase for a wallet. Please note that your mnemonic is a secret key that should never be shared, even not with our {{ appName }}.
Executing this search is highly unlikely to return any results. If you want to proceed nonetheless, please add “{{ wordsOfPower }}” in front of your search query to perform the search at your own risk.

search.mobilePlaceholder: Search Address, Block, Txn, Token, etc

noResults.description: Please try another search query <OptionalBreak>or <HomeLink>explore Oasis</HomeLink></OptionalBreak>

otherResults.clickToShowThem: We found {{ countLabel }} on other Networks. Click to open these results.
otherResults.clickToShowMore: We also found {{ countLabel }} on other Networks. Click to open these results.
otherResults.clickToHide: The results from other Networks are shown below. Click to hide those results.

search.searchSuggestions: Not sure what to look for? Try out a search: <OptionalBreak><BlockLink><BlockIcon/> Block</BlockLink>, <TransactionLink><TransactionIcon/> Transaction</TransactionLink>, <AccountLink><AccountIcon/> Address</AccountLink>, <TokenLink><TokenIcon/> Token</TokenLink> </OptionalBreak>.
search.wordsOfPower: I COMMAND THEE TO SEARCH FOR
